channel.title: Server Online [Finally] One More Thing
channel.description: When my friend tries to login, he logins it works, but it freezes then logs him out. I use the run win 7, and IDK bout the other ones. Someone please help you need a code tell for the 64 bit run regular run or the win 7 <-- i use

item.title: Server Online [Finally] One More Thing
item.dc:creator: @Barrick Barrick
item.description:
@Barrick wrote:

Regular Run -

@echo off Title Client START java -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit

64 bit Run -

@echo off Title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit
@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

Windows 7 is the one I use. My friend tried the regular run and thats all he tried, and he lagged. I see a diffrence in the regular run, theres no 86x I dunno if thats the problem

Read full topic

item.title: Server Online [Finally] One More Thing
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

Because I could barely understand your post, I’ll give you all the options.

If it looks like this:

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\java.exe"

and it doesn’t work, remove the (x86), and vice versa, add it if it doesn’t work without it.

Read full topic
